Main Page   Modules   Data Structures   File List   Data Fields  

Fast functions, no updating of boundaries!
[Class Pixel group container.]

Optimized functions, the programmer must be sure that the code is without bugs, no checks in these functions. More...

Functions

bool k_RemovePosFromGroupFast (unsigned int Index, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_RemovePosFromGroup, except that there is no range check for given index and the boundary is not updated and hence the function is a lot faster.

void k_AddPosToGroupFast (INT16 x, INT16 y, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_RemovePosFromGroup, except the boundary is not updated.

void k_Add2DPosToGroupFast (T2DInt Pos, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_AddPosToGroupFast(), except the position is given in a T2DInt structure.

bool k_InsertPosInGroupFast (INT16 x, INT16 y, unsigned int Index, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_InsertPosInGroup, except that there is no range check for given index and if colors are available it is ignored, the function simply inserts the position without referencing the color.

bool k_Insert2DPosInGroupFast (T2DInt Pos, unsigned int Index, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_InsertPosInGroupFast, except the position is given in a T2DInt structure.

void k_AddPosColorToGroupFast (INT16 x, INT16 y, UINT32 Color, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_AddPosToGroupFast, except a color value is also inserted.

void k_Add2DPosColorToGroupFast (T2DInt Pos, UINT32 Color, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_AddPosColorToGroupFast(x,y), except the position is given in a T2DInt structure.

bool k_InsertPosColorInGroupFast (INT16 x, INT16 y, UINT32 Color, unsigned int Index, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_InsertPosInGroupFast(x,y), except a color value is also inserted.

bool k_Insert2DPosColorInGroupFast (T2DInt Pos, UINT32 Color, unsigned int Index, TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup)
 Same as k_InsertPosColorInGroupFast(x,y), except the position is given in a T2DInt structure.

bool k_GroupAddOffset (TPixelGroup *pPixelGroup, T2DInt Offset)
 Adds an offset to all points in group.

Detailed Description

Optimized functions, the programmer must be sure that the code is without bugs, no checks in these functions.

Version:
1.00
Author:
René Dencker Eriksen edr@mip.sdu.dk

Function Documentation

void k_Add2DPosColorToGroupFast (  T2DInt    Pos,
UINT32    Color,
TPixelGroup *    pPixelGroup
) 
 

Same as k_AddPosColorToGroupFast(x,y), except the position is given in a T2DInt structure.

Parameters:
Pos  Position to add to PixelGroup.
Returns :
False, if colors are not available, in that case the function does nothing.
See also:
k_GroupUpdateBoundaries

void k_AddPosToGroupFast (  INT16    x,
INT16    y,
TPixelGroup *    pPixelGroup
) 
 

Same as k_RemovePosFromGroup, except the boundary is not updated.

Call k_GroupUpdateBoundaries() anytime to update boundaries.

Parameters:
x  (INT16) Position in horisontal direction.
y  (INT16) Position in vertical direction.
See also:

bool k_GroupAddOffset (  TPixelGroup *    pPixelGroup,
T2DInt    Offset
) 
 

Adds an offset to all points in group.

Boundaries are updated.

Parameters:
Offset  The offset value to be added to all positions.
Returns :
False, if the group is empty.

Definition at line 1864 of file kernel_pixelgroup.c.

References INT16, k_Add2DPosColorToGroupFast(), TPixelGroup::NumberOfPixels, TPixelGroup::pColor, TPixelGroup::pPos, UINT32, T2DInt::x, and T2DInt::y.

bool k_InsertPosInGroupFast (  INT16    x,
INT16    y,
unsigned int    Index,
TPixelGroup *    pPixelGroup
) 
 

Same as k_InsertPosInGroup, except that there is no range check for given index and if colors are available it is ignored, the function simply inserts the position without referencing the color.

Call k_GroupUpdateBoundaries() anytime to update boundaries.

Parameters:
x  (INT16) Position in horisontal direction.
y  (INT16) Position in vertical direction.
Index  Index in the array of positions to be removed.
Returns :
True, always.
See also:
k_InsertPosInGroup , k_GroupUpdateBoundaries

Definition at line 1807 of file kernel_pixelgroup.c.

References INT16, k_Add2DPosToGroupFast(), TPixelGroup::NumberOfPixels, TPixelGroup::pPos, T2DInt::x, and T2DInt::y.

bool k_RemovePosFromGroupFast (  unsigned int    Index,
TPixelGroup *    pPixelGroup
) 
 

Same as k_RemovePosFromGroup, except that there is no range check for given index and the boundary is not updated and hence the function is a lot faster.

Returns :
True, always.
See also:
k_RemovePosFromGroup
